GenAiFunction.description: Call this action only once per certification selection or change, when converting a user-mentioned certification name to its ID. Input: Certification name (exact or fuzzy match if supported). Output: Certification ID. Store the ID in session immediately after retrieval to avoid repeated calls. If no match, prompt user: "I couldn't find a certification matching '[Name]'. Please check the name or select from the list." Do not call if ID is already stored.
